titleStmt.title: Elymas the sorcerer, or, A memorial towards the discovery of the bottom of this Popish-Plot and how far his R. Highness's directors have been faithful to his honour and interest, or the peace of the nation : publish'd upon occasion of a passage in the late Dutchess of York's declaration for changing her religion / by Tho. Jones ...
titleStmt.author: Jones, Thomas, 1622?-1682.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
